attributes.action: pay the members of the Coastguard, the forgotten emergency service, the wage they are due.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the resounding vote in favour of strike action over the low pay for staff of the coastguard compared to other emergency service staff please allow the pay to be increased to provide comparability with these other services.  A Coastguard watch assistant, who is actively part of the emergency planning for the search and rescue of lives at sea now find themselves being paid only the national minimum wage.
